title: Jet Lagged in the Strip Club with ‘Industry’ Co-Creators Mickey Down and Konrad Kay
description:
It’s not podcasting, it’s Throwing Fits. This week the boys are proving their worth by going head-to-head with another powerful duo, Mickey Down and Konrad Kay, the co-creators and writers of our favorite show of 2020, ‘Industry’. It’s an instant classic tag team match for the ages, spanning not just the Atlantic, but Pierpoint & Co. merch, the politics of investment banking style, working and playing hard, quitting your job, screenwriting, subverting stereotypes, monstrous personalities and much more on this episode of The Only Podcast That Matters™.
Throwing Fits x Seasons: Use promo code “throwingfits” at checkout or subscribe at http://szns.co/throwingfits
For more Throwing Fits, check us out on Patreon: www.patreon.com/throwingfits.
